headline: Should Ford’s 700-Mile F-150 Lightning Redesign Require Action From Ford Motor (F) Investors?
summary: In recent days, Ford Motor unveiled the next generation of its F-150 Lightning pickup, featuring Extended Range Electric Vehicle technology with an estimated range above 700 miles and the ability to export power to work sites and homes. This launch underscores Ford’s effort to reshape its electrification approach by pairing advanced EV capabilities with practical utility that may appeal to truck buyers. We’ll now examine how this next-generation F-150 Lightning, with its extended-range and...

headline: The road to victory for Mercedes in F1 heats up with AI
summary: Opening Bid Unfiltered is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, YouTube, or wherever you get your podcasts. From the racetrack to the race for cybersecurity spending dollars. Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi sits down on the Opening Bid Unfiltered podcast with CrowdStrike (CRWD) founder and CEO George Kurtz. The conversation veered off down a few side streets, so to speak. Kurtz is an accomplished endurance racer, and that led him recently to purchase a 15% minority interest in the Mercedes F1 team. It’s an incredible combination of Kurtz’s public company experience, tech expertise, and passion for racing. At the same time, CrowdStrike is gearing up for a big 2026 in the eyes of Wall Street as more AI agents raise the risk of cybersecurity threats. Kurtz reveals his operating playbook for the road ahead. Listen on your favorite podcast platform or watch on our website for full episodes of Opening Bid Unfiltered. Yahoo Finance's Opening Bid Unfiltered is produced by Langston Sessoms.

content.title: The road to victory for Mercedes in F1 heats up with AI
content.description:
Opening Bid Unfiltered is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, YouTube, or wherever you get your podcasts.

From the racetrack to the race for cybersecurity spending dollars. Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi sits down on the Opening Bid Unfiltered podcast with CrowdStrike (CRWD) founder and CEO George Kurtz. The conversation veered off down a few side streets, so to speak. Kurtz is an accomplished endurance racer, and that led him recently to purchase a 15% minority interest in the Mercedes F1 team. It’s an incredible combination of Kurtz’s public company experience, tech expertise, and passion for racing. At the same time, CrowdStrike is gearing up for a big 2026 in the eyes of Wall Street as more AI agents raise the risk of cybersecurity threats. Kurtz reveals his operating playbook for the road ahead.

Listen on your favorite podcast platform or watch on our website for full episodes of Opening Bid Unfiltered.

Yahoo Finance's Opening Bid Unfiltered is produced by Langston Sessoms.

headline: Better Dividend Stock: Ford vs. Pfizer
summary: Both Ford and Pfizer have very attractive dividend yields.
